content:
- 'Description': This intent enables users to generate predictions about
    their future spending based on past trends.
  'Skill Id': d67fdfe023fb4d6badcc3cb0d5e
  'Slot':
  - 'Description': The category of the expense to be predicted.
    'Entity Id': 6eb86e38d9784c528cca03cf59b
  - 'Description': The time period for which the expenses will be predicted.
    'Entity Id': 97afbf1e0f1849e0ba5e43f5413
- 'Description': Encompasses all problems and concerns related to the device's
    battery, including overheating, drain, and charging issues.
  'Skill Id': cc482c4144cb4bea900b34be592
  'Slot':
  - 'Description': The brand of the mobile device experiencing battery issues.
    'Entity Id': 87ec5505746f4e13bb610d46349
  - 'Description': The type of battery issue being experienced.
    'Entity Id': cb3e557caf634be48c5ce706b85
    'Required values':
    - drains quickly
    - does not charge
    - overheats
    - swells
    - does not turn on
- 'Description': Describes unexpected behavior or errors in specific applications.
  'Skill Id': 98953dcb3c494690b8066101405
  'Slot':
  - 'Description': The name of the mobile application experiencing issues.
    'Entity Id': 3b91099ae74641f09930f8fa2ca
  - 'Description': The type of problem or malfunction occurring in the app.
    'Entity Id': ce4ab52a80464b4ea92f4ed15fd
  - 'Description': The mobile operating system the app is installed on.
    'Entity Id': 22e270d0f54c4f288c40aeed97f
    'Required values':
    - iOS
    - Android
- 'Description': This intent allows users to create a new budget, setting
    spending goals and limits for various categories.
  'Skill Id': 452ffa82e9944071a3b886f5f16
  'Slot':
  - 'Description': The category of expenses to budget for.
    'Entity Id': af37eb3382d840959d7c89e7bf1
  - 'Description': The amount of money allocated for the budget category.
    'Entity Id': b07deabba7c540cfa7283bbe8d3
    'Required values':
    - '0.00'
    - '1.00'
    - '10.00'
    - '100.00'
    - '500.00'
    - '1000.00'
    - '2000.00'
    - '5000.00'
  - 'Description': The time period the budget plan will cover.
    'Entity Id': 20a70c7d49384762a679f158192
